text: nampikkaiyalarkal (marumaiyil) ivarkalaic cuttik kanpittu â€˜â€˜niccayamaka nankalum unkalutan irukkirom enru allahvin mitu urutiyana cattiyam ceytu kontiruntavarkal ivarkaltana?'' Enru kuruvarkal. Ivarkalutaiya nanmaikal anaittum alintu vittana. Akave, (ivarkal) nastamataintavarkalakave akivittanar
